content: That's really helpful. I've been thinking about sharing my cooking creations on Instagram, and I've already started using hashtags to reach a wider audience. I've also been experimenting with different cooking techniques and ingredients to stay inspired. Speaking of inspiration, I had a conversation with a friend who told me about her regular social media breaks, and it got me thinking about my own social media habits. Do you have any tips on how to stay intentional with my social media usage and avoid mindless scrolling?
